sentences.sContent: The design strategy embraces textural contrast and celebrates the dissonance of eclectic elements to create a truly memorable patron experience.
sentences.sContent_eng: The design strategy embraces textural contrast and celebrates the dissonance of eclectic elements to create a truly memorable patron experience.
sentences.sCn: 设计策略包括结构设计对比以及折中元素对比，建立一个真正令人难忘的顾客体验。
